dct_title_s: A new and accurate map of Africa, from the latest and best observations
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. Probably issued in: Universal magazine of knowledge and pleasure. London : J. Hinton, 1747-1766. John Hinton was located at Newgate Street from 1752 to 1765. cf. Tooley's dictionary of mapmakers.
dct_publisher_sm: Newgate Street [London] : Univers. Mag., J. Hinton, [1747-1766]
